src_text: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src_text: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.
ref_text: Sabab bulu dinosaurus kada bisi purus pusat nang marangkat sampurna, nang ngarannya rachis, tapi baciri bulu lain — duri wan barbule — bubuhan panaliti manyimpulakan rachis itu nangkaya rangkatan epolusi lanjutan matan ciri-ciri lain ngini.
hyp_text: Sababnya bulu dinosaurus ngitu takada pangembangan tulang keras, disebut rachis, tapi ada ciri-ciri bulu lain — rambut dan rambut-rambut — maka peneliti ngitu mengira-ngira pangembangan rachis ngini mungkinlah pangembangan evolusi yang datang kemudian dari ciri-ciri ngitu lain.

src_text: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

hyp_text: Struktur bulu ngitu nyatakan nang mereka tidak dipakai dalam penerbang, tapi lebih kepenting untuk regulasi suhu atawa pertunjukan. Para peneliti ngitu sarankan, walaupun iko adalah ekor dari dinosaurus muda, contoh ngitu tunjukkan bulu dewasa dan tidak bulu anak.

src_text: The tiger is in the same group (Genus Panthera) as lions, leopards, and jaguars. These four cats are the only ones who can roar.

hyp_text: Sembilan harimau ngini bagian satoe kumpulan (Genus Panthera) nang mangrupa harimau, singa, panah, wan jaguar. Empat hewan kucing ngini satengge, nang kawa manggah bantuan.

src_text: Ocelots like to eat small animals. They will catch monkeys, snakes, rodents and birds if they can. Almost all of the animals that the ocelot hunts are far smaller than it is.
ref_text: Ocelot katuju makan binatang halus. Inya cagar manangkap warik, ular, binatang pangarat, wan burung kalo inya kawa. Handak sabarataan binatang nang Ocelot buru ngitu jauh labih halus daripada dirinya.
hyp_text: Ocelot ngini kawa makan binatang kecil. Mereka akan tangkap monyet, ular, tikus, wan burung kalau kawa. Hampir semua binatang nang dihuni ocelot tuah lebih kecil daripada diri nang ngini.

ref_text: Buhan ilmuwan bapikir kalo ocelot maumpati wan mandapati binatang gasan dimakan (dimangsa) malalui bau, manciumi di mana buhannya barada di atas tanah.

src_text: They can see very well in the dark with night vision, and move very stealthily, too. Ocelots hunt their prey by blending in with their surroundings then pouncing on their prey.
ref_text: Inya kawa malihat dengan jalas dalam kadap lawan panglihatan malam, wan bagarak diam-diam, juwa. Ocelots mamburu mangsanya pakai cara basambunyi di sakitaran imbah tu marungkau mangsanya.
hyp_text: Urang iya kawa mangarti banar-banar di dalam gelap dengan penglihatan malam, wan ngalir banar-banar, juga. Ocelot ngahunti mangsanya dengan ngablinting ngawarna nang lingkungan, lalu ngapung mangsanya.

src_text: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.
ref_text: Pas kalumpuk halus makhluk hidup (dalam populasi halus) tapisah matan pupulasi utamanya wadahnya baasal (misalnya inya pindah ka wilayah pagunungan atawa sungai, atawa kalau inya pindah ka pulau hanyar jadi inya ngalih handak babulik) inya cagar rancak marasa ada wadah nang balain matan nang buhannya dahulu.
hyp_text: Kapalo sa'ikung kalaharan urang (kalaharan kecil) ngitu, kalaharan nang baparti dari kalaharan nang asalannyo (seperti kalau kalaharan ngitu pindah atas rangkaian bukit atau sungai, atau kalau kalaharan ngitu pindah ka pulau anyar supaya ngitu tak dapat mudah kembali), kalaharan ngitu biasanya bakal manjadi diri di lingkungan nang beda daripada lingkungan nang tadinya.

src_text: In the context of Romanticism, the geography molded individuals, and over time customs and culture related to that geography arose, and these, being in harmony with the place of the society, were better than arbitrarily imposed laws.

hyp_text: Dalam konteks Romantisisme, geografi ngitu ngambaran urang, wan sasakal budaya wan adat istiadat nang kaitan dengan geografi ngitu mangalir, wan urang ngitu, nang dalam harmoni nang tempat masyarakat, lebih bagus daripada hukum-hukum yang diimposi secara acak.

src_text: Subsistence agriculture is a simple, often organic, system using saved seed native to the ecoregion combined with crop rotation or other relatively simple techniques to maximize yield.
ref_text: Kahidupan partanian sadarhana haja, labih ka alami, tataan mamakai banih simpanan asli ekoregion disatuakan wan paputaran tanaman atawa tehnik-tehnik sadarhana lainnya gasan mamaksimalakan hasilnya.
hyp_text: Tanih subsistensi adalah sistem sederhana, kacuali organik, nang nggunakan biji pambantu asli dari wilayah ekoregion, disamping rotasi panen atau teknik-teknik lain sederhana lain nggunakan untuk maningkatkan hasil.

src_text: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River.

src_text: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout.
ref_text: Makanan urang Majorca, mirip nang kaya daerah Mediterania, babahan dasar ruti, sayuran, wan daging (hususnya babi), wan mamakai minyak zaitun.
hyp_text: Masakan Majorca, kayak zona-kay zona di Marenitania, di dasarakan atas roti, sayur-sayuran, dan daging (khususnya babi), wan nggunakan minyak zaitun nang sakumaha.

src_text: A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.
ref_text: Makan malam sadarhana nang dikatujui, hususnya saban musim panas, yato Pa amb Oli: Ruti pakai minyak zaitun, tumat, wan tarsadia taburan apa ja nang kaya keju, iwak tuna, wan lainnya.
hyp_text: Makan malam sederhana nan populer, khususnya dalam musim panas, adolah Pa amb Oli: Roti dengan minyak zaitun, tomat, wan segala bumbu-bumbu nan tadah, contohnya keju, tuna, dsb.

src_text: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
ref_text: Kabanyakan tapsiran matan tiknulugi determinisme babagi dua gagasan umum: bahuwa parkambangan tiknulugi natu surangan maumpati langkah nang sabagian basar ada di luar pangaruh budaya atawa pulitik.
hyp_text: Interpretasi-interpretasi determinisme teknologi umum nang bagian kada duo ide: teknologi ngitu sendiri ngiring jalur kada besar dipengaruhi budaya atawa politik, wan teknologi ngitu kembali punya 'efek' pada masyarakat nang asli, bukan dipengaruhi sosial.

src_text: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.
ref_text: Kakanakan nangkaya ngitu disambatnya "feral" atawa liar. Babarapa kakanakan liar suah dikurung wan urang (rancak tuh kuitannya surang) babarapa parihal kakanakan nang talantar ngini sabab kuitannya kada kawa manarima kakurangan anaknya atawa cacat pisik.
hyp_text: Urang-urang iko disebut 'feral' atau liar. Sama feral urang iko alah diikat oleh urang (biasanya orang tuanyo); di beberapa kasus iko, tabadalan anak iko alah disebabkan oleh orang tuanyo ngiringi cacat mental atau fisik anak yang sangat parah.
